mapper.select: select d.url,p.name from tb_documents d,tb_params p where d.document_type = p.value and p.type='document_type' and d.company_id = #{companyId} and p.name= #{name}
select value from tb_params where type='document_type' and name=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_documents(url, document_type, company_id) values (#{url},#{documentType},#{companyId})
insert into tb_employee_data(url, document_type, company_id) values (#{url},#{documentType},#{companyId})
